# actionSets

**Instance Property**

Array of all action sets that will be executed by the trigger.

## Declaration

```swift
var actionSets: [HMActionSet] { get }
```

## Discussion

Action sets are instances of [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMActionSet].

## Managing Action Sets

- **addActionSet(_:completionHandler:)**: Adds an action set to the trigger.
- **removeActionSet(_:completionHandler:)**: Removes an action set from the trigger.
